alert.note: Alert for Bon Homme; Charles Mix; Douglas; Gregory; Hutchinson; Turner; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 2:54AM MDT until July 12 at 3:15AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CHARLES MIX...SOUTHEASTERN GREGORY...BON HOMME... SOUTHEASTERN DOUGLAS...NORTHERN YANKTON...SOUTHWESTERN TURNER AND HUTCHINSON COUNTIES... At 353 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Freeman to near Verdel, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Mayfield, Tyndall, Tabor and Lewis And Clark State Recreation Area. Between 335 and 340 am CDT, winds reached 69 mph at the South Dakota Road Weather Information system site just northwest of Tripp. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bon Homme; Charles Mix; Douglas; Gregory; Hutchinson; Turner; Yankton
